title: Zar Amir Ebrahimi, an Iranian Exile, Channels Trauma in ‘Holy Spider’
description: Zar Amir Ebrahimi, who had to flee Iran after an intimate tape was leaked, has been transfixed by the protests erupting there as her film “Holy Spider” is released in the U.S.
dc:creator: Roger Cohen
media:credit: Elliott Verdier for The New York Times
